message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hey Alice, that's a bit more than I was hoping to spend. I'd be interested if you'd be willing to come down to $80. I'm really keen on the product but that's my max.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $100 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  How about $90?  I'm really hoping we can find a way to make this work.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $95, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
